questions.question: How do I create my digital menu?
questions.answer: Creating your digital menu is simple. After signing up, you can easily add categories, items, prices, and descriptions through our intuitive dashboard. Upload images, customize layouts, and your menu will be ready to share in minutes.

questions.question: Can I update my menu in real-time?
questions.answer: Yes! You can update your menu anytime through our dashboard. Changes are reflected instantly across all platforms where your menu is shared, including QR codes and social media links.

questions.question: How does the QR code system work?
questions.answer: Each menu gets a unique QR code that you can print and display in your restaurant. When customers scan the code with their smartphone, they'll see your latest menu instantly in their browser - no app download required.

questions.question: Is the platform mobile-friendly?
questions.answer: Absolutely! Our menus are fully responsive and optimized for all devices - smartphones, tablets, and desktop computers. Your customers will enjoy a seamless experience regardless of their device.

questions.question: What payment methods do you accept?
questions.answer: We accept major credit cards, debit cards, and digital payment methods. All payments are processed securely through our trusted payment gateway partners.

userGuide.title: AI Menu Extraction Guide
userGuide.intro: This tool helps you quickly build your menu by extracting products from menu images using AI. Follow these steps to get the best results:

step1.title: 1. Prepare a clear image of your menu
step1.description: Take a clear, well-lit photo of your menu or use a digital menu file. Make sure text is readable and prices are visible.

step2.title: 2. Upload your menu image
step2.description: Drag and drop your image into the upload area or click to browse files. Supported formats: JPG, PNG, WebP (max 10MB).

step3.title: 3. Process with AI
step3.description: Click "Extract with AI" to process your image. Our AI will identify products, prices, and categorize items automatically.

step4.title: 4. Review and organize
step4.description: Review extracted products grouped by category. Create categories by clicking the "+" button next to each group.

step5.title: 5. Add products to your menu
step5.description: Click the "+" button next to each product to add it to your menu. You can edit details before saving.

tips.title: Tips for best results
tips.tip1: Use high-resolution, well-lit images with clear text for better extraction accuracy.
tips.tip2: Create categories first before adding products to organize your menu efficiently.
tips.tip3: Review extracted prices carefully as they may need adjustment.
tips.tip4: For menus with multiple pages, process each page separately for best results.
